documentation.title: XML Based Documentation
documentation.section:
The following features are supported by the XML based documentation:
Numbered section titles
like bold, italic and underlined
Itemization and enumeration
Referencing a section title by a unique key
Code blocks
Customizable stylesheets

A section is a XML tag with name section and the attribute title. Each section may contain any number of further sections building up a hierarchy. A simple section could look like the following one: <section title="A simple section"> This is a very <bold>simple</bold> section </section>
Each section will automatically get a number and each child section will increase the title tag (h2, h3, h4, ...) automatically so that the font size (usually) decreases.
